property.name: description
property.value: A stationary Flower. Attacks by shooting flashing projectiles at [[HERO_SWORD]].

property.name: description
property.value: A Blue Bird monster. Blocks the way to the maze and must be frozen by the [[White Cloak]].

property.name: description
property.value: A Yellow Lizard. Attacks by shooting projectiles at [[HERO_SWORD]]. Occasionally jumps to a predetermined spot in the area.

property.name: description
property.value: A White Monster. Walks around in random directions, harming [[HERO_SWORD]] when touched.

property.name: description
property.value: Text that displays upon entering the room. Directs [[HERO_SWORD]] to the [[White Cloak]] and hints at how to solve the upcoming maze.

object.name: THE FORBIDDEN PATH BEGAN WITH ICE MAGIC

property.name: description
property.value: Text that displays upon entering this room. Alludes to the [[Weird Route]] and how it is initiated using [[Noelle]]'s ice magic.

property.name: description
property.value: [[HERO_SWORD]] unlocks the door using the [[Ice Key]], which is "used up" and disappears from their inventory. The [[White Cloak]] is also "used up" and disappears.

property.name: description
property.value: The [[Shadow Mantle Holder]] speaks to [[Kris]] directly and congratulates them for finding their hiding place. After retrieving the [[Shelter Key]], the game states that Kris was "used up" and shuts off.

property.name: description
property.value: A figure in a white cloak. Upon leaving the room, the figure begins to follow [[HERO_SWORD]] throughout the dungeon. In addition, leaving sends them to the room outside of the other White Cloak room as if they are the same room.

property.name: page
property.value: White Cloak

property.name: description
property.value: A figure in a white cloak. Upon leaving the room, the figure begins to follow [[HERO_SWORD]] throughout the dungeon.

property.name: page
property.value: White Cloak

property.name: description
property.value: [[HERO_SWORD]] must use the [[White Cloak]] to freeze the Gray Monsters and push them onto the pressure plates. For rooms that do not have enough monsters. [[HERO_SWORD]] must push the last pressure plate themselves.

property.name: description
property.value: [[HERO_SWORD]] is presented with a single looping room. They must navigate the maze in the direction the [[White Cloak]] follows them. The White Cloak freezes in place in front of incorrect pathways.

property.name: description
property.value: A key used to unlock the [[Manhole Dungeon#Shelter|Shelter]] in the [[City Board (Original Game)|City Board]]'s [[Manhole Dungeon]].

property.name: page
property.value: Shelter Key
